title: How to Make an Orange Mocha Smoothie

steps.headline: Cut the orange into four quarters.
Cut each quarter into smaller slices.
Remove the peel from each orange.
steps.description: Remove any pith (the white skin) from the orange pieces.

steps.headline: Place the orange slices into the blender.
Add the rest of the ingredients.
Blend on high for one minute more.
Pour into a cup.
steps.description: It is now ready to serve.

text: Preparing the Orange Cut the orange into four quarters.  Cut each quarter into smaller slices.  Remove the peel from each orange. Remove any pith (the white skin) from the orange pieces. Making the Smoothie Place the orange slices into the blender.  Add the rest of the ingredients.  Blend to puree everything together. Blend on low to combine. Blend on high for one minute more.  Pour into a cup. It is now ready to serve.
